common_1010_rival_02:
Arven said there’d be tons of strong Pokémon,
so here I am![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_friend_02:
Once she heard she’d get to battle awesome
Pokémon, she was here in a second.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1010_friend_03:
You’re an annoying little pest at the academy,
but I guess you could come in handy for this.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1010_rival_03:
Spoken like a guy who wants to get beaten
in a battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_rival_04:
But more importantly—why’s it so dark? And
where’re the awesome Pokémon?![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_friend_04:
Yeah, it IS weird that the lights are off...\c
The last time I was here, the electricity was up
and running. But now...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1010_rival_05: Well, NOW the lights are on![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_botan_02: Seems like they were on power-saving mode.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1010_botan_03:
I hacked into the system controls and overrode
the settings...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1010_rival_06: Oh! It’s you—the kid with the fluffy Eevee bag![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_rival_07:
Well, hey! We never got to actually talk!
I’m Nemona! I’m in class 1-A!\c
You must be some kind of tech whiz!\c
Do you like Pokémon battling too?![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_botan_05: Urk. You talk, like...way too much...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1010_friend_06:
The director introduced us. When you need
someone good with tech, I guess it’s a no-brainer.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1010_friend_07:
Anyway, Penny here also agreed in a second
when she heard it was to help [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1010_botan_06:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I’m not really the adventuring type...but I owe
you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].\r
And\r
I\r
pay\r
my debts.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1010_friend_09:
And of course everyone knows me, Arven! My
loves include my Mabosstiff and cooking and—[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1010_hakase_02a:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. I have been
expecting you.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1010_hakase_02b:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. I have been
expecting you.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1010_hakase_03a:
And it seems you have gathered a group of
formidable allies as well.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1010_hakase_03b:
And it seems you have gathered a group of
formidable allies as well.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1010_hakase_04a:
Nemona. Student ID number 805C001.
And Penny. Student ID number 803B121.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1010_hakase_04b:
Nemona. Student ID number 805C001.
And Penny. Student ID number 803B121.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1010_rival_09:
Of course, Professor! Oh my gosh, it’s such an
honor to meet you in person!\c
I mean, maybe not “in person” exactly...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_botan_08: Arven, did you...uh...tell your [VAR 1107(00FF,0303)]momdad about us?[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1010_friend_10: When would I have done that?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1010_hakase_06a:
To begin with, I’d like to ask you all to make
your way down into the Great Crater of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1010_hakase_06b:
To begin with, I’d like to ask you all to make
your way down into the Great Crater of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1010_hakase_07a:
You can reach the lower chamber using the
elevator you can see to your right.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1010_hakase_07b:
You can reach the lower chamber using the
elevator you can see to your right.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1010_rival_11:
I wonder if the professor’s any good at
Pokémon battling...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1010_botan_10a:
Sada used to be really famous. Everyone knew
who she was.\c
But she hasn’t been in the media in, like...ages.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1010_botan_10b:
Turo used to be really famous. Everyone knew
who he was.\c
But he hasn’t been in the media in, like...ages.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1010_friend_stopper:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Where’re you off to,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]?\r
We’re\r
supposed\r
to\r
head down.[VAR 0114(0006)]
